column.name: Code
column.oldValue: cast(C_BPartner.C_BP_Group_ID as text) in (select ParamValue from cg_parameter where name in ('ownCarrierGroupID','thirdCarrierGroupID'))
column.newValue: cast(C_BPartner.C_BP_Group_ID as text) in (select ParamValue from cg_parameter where name in ('IdentificadorGrupoCamionesTerceros','IdentificadorGrupoCamionesPropios'))

column.name: Code
column.oldValue: cast(C_BPartner.C_BP_Group_ID as text) in (select ParamValue from cg_parameter where name in ('IdentificadorGrupoCamionesTerceros','IdentificadorGrupoCamionesPropios'))
column.newValue: cast(C_BPartner.C_BP_Group_ID as text) in (select ParamValue from cg_parameter where name in ('IDGrupoCamionesTerceros','IDGrupoCamionesPropios'))
